At least a Half Billion in PPP Loans Won't Be Repaid

articles.title: Walmart sees stockpiling again as Covid cases rise—but this time it's localized - CNBC
articles.description: Walmart CEO Doug McMillon said in certain states and cities, shoppers are stocking up on toilet paper, cleaning supplies and dry food.
articles.content:
Walmart CEO Doug McMillon said Tuesday that customers are loading up on items such as toilet paper again as coronavirus cases rise but he said the retail giant is better prepared to keep up.
